title: Analysis: How the CAQ government's flip-flops on health care hurt everyone
author: Aaron Derfel
blurb: Today, nearly 1.9 million Quebecers who are at least 20 years old do not have access to a family doctor.

title: Stu's Slapshots: Canadiens' Arber Xhekaj reaches his own milestone
author: Stu Cowan
blurb: Habs defenceman, who was never selected at NHL Draft, plays in in 100th game after getting a little help from new Ottawa Senators owner.

title: Deer stranded on West Island REM tracks is safely removed
author: Montreal Gazette
blurb: It was to be transported to a wooded area in Kirkland and released.

title: Habs Mailbag: Fans are questioning Canadiens' hybrid defensive system
author: Stu Cowan
blurb: It's also confusing for former Canadiens players Rick Green and Chris Nilan, who were part of Montreal's 1986 Stanley Cup team.

title: Jack Todd: Whining already? Chill out, Habs fans
author: Jack Todd
blurb: After the Canadiens lost to the Kings on Thursday, I couldn’t take the moaning, bitching and caterwauling on social media for another minute.
